033public interface Call extends ModelElement {
034        /**
035         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>Type</b></em>' attribute.
036         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
037         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
038         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
039         * Fully qualified class name. Mutually exclusive with ``service`` and ``property``. One of ``class``, ``property``, or ``service`` is required.
040         * 
041         * For SupplierFactory adapter, if the class implements SupplierFactory then it is instantiated and then its ``create()`` method is invoked to create a supplier.
042         * If the class implements Supplier, then it is instantiated. If there are no ``init`` arguments, then the supplier is diagnosed as part of ``diagnose()``. 
043         * Otherwise it is diagnosed in ``execute()`` and diagnostic results are discarded.
044         * 
045         * Similar processing will be implemented for Consumer and Command.
046         * 
047         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
048         * @return the value of the '<em>Type</em>' attribute.
049         * @see #setType(String)
050         * @see org.nasdanika.exec.ExecPackage#getCall_Type()
051         * @model annotation="urn:org.nasdanika feature-key='class' exclusive-with='service property' default-feature='true'"
052         * @generated
053         */
054        String getType();

143         * The key is of type {@link java.lang.String},
144         * and the value is of type {@link org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject},
145         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
146         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
147         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
148         * A map injected into the instance in the ``class`` case if the instance implements ${javadoc/java.util.function.BiConsumer} or in the service or property case if they implement SupplierFactory. If elements implement SupplierFactory then the supplier factory is used to produce value to be injected. Otherwise elements are injected AS-IS.

161         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
162         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
163         * An optional array of constructor arguments for the ``class``. Not applicable for ``property`` and ``service``. If elements implement SupplierFactory then the factory is used to produce argument values. Then arguments get converted to constructor parameter types if conversion is available. If conversion is not available, an exception is thrown.
164         * <!-- end-model-doc -->

179         * An optional array of method arguments. If elements implement SupplierFactory, then the factory is used to produce argument value. Then arguments get converted to method parameter types if conversion is available. If conversion is not available, an exception is thrown.
